articles.description: The legendary golfer broke both his legs in a horror accident in Los Angeles nine months ago, and has been out of action since - but has now posted a video which is sparking hopes of a comeback.
articles.content:
Tiger Woods has posted a video of him hitting golf balls for the first time since his dramatic car crash in February, sparking hopes of a comeback to the sport.
